title: Part C
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions:
The response does not include calculations equivalent to both of the following and the corresponding answers.

  • 250.0 mL  ×   1.000 L 1000. mL  ×  1.600 mol glycine 1.000 L   =  0.4000 mol glycine MathType@MTEF@5@5@@7649@

  • 0.4000 mol glycine  ×  75.07 g glycine 1.000 mol glycine   =  30.03 g glycine MathType@MTEF@5@5@@75BD@

The response includes calculations equivalent to both of the following and the corresponding answers.

  • 250.0 mL  ×   1.000 L 1000. mL  ×  1.600 mol glycine 1.000 L   =  0.4000 mol glycine MathType@MTEF@5@5@@7649@

  • 0.4000 mol glycine  ×  75.07 g glycine 1.000 mol glycine   =  30.03 g glycine MathType@MTEF@5@5@@75BD@

Notes:

  • No penalty for including the first calculation in the set-up of one larger calculation

  • The final answer must include four significant figures
